item.title: Mystery of Godliness 6
item.description: The fundamental issue of being born again was raised by Christ before Nicodemus in John 3. This was because of the kind of life Nicodemus carried, but he was not aware of it. The problem with mankind is the specie of life he carries about in this earthen vessel. Mankind is not aware of the fallen nature dwelling within him, because nothing happened to the body (the container).

item.title: Temptation & Sin Part 5
item.description: Have you ever sat down and thought about the conversation between Eve and the Serpent in Genesis 3:1-6? Who do think she was having conversation with? Is there any link between the Serpent and the Old dragon who deceives mankind? This is a continuation from Part 4. Join us in this next series on the association between Temptation and Sin as we looked at the unusual conversation between the woman and the serpent in the garden of Eden.

item.title: Temptation & Sin Part 3
item.description: Few things are universal to mankind. Two of them are Temptation and Sin. And these two are not your friend. Perhaps because they are common to all is the reason why we downplay them or wink at them. But what would be the consequence of such error? Is Temptation sin? I leave you with the answer.

item.title: Temptation & Sin Part 2
item.description: With many choices flashing at us today like a Formula 1 race car, it is becoming increasingly difficult for many to resist the fluidity of adverts from running in their mileages right before our faces.
